title: Name that i want
body: ok I want to change my summoner name to  something but some level 1 account has it and it has been inactive for about as long as I can remember HOW would I go about getting into contact with someone that could help me?

replies.body: It always sucks when you think of the perfect name only to find out someone already claimed it. However, it wouldn't be fair for us to take that name away and give it to someone else regardless of how active that account may be.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=WB6V7r9p,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-27T01:14:35.365+0000)
>
> It always sucks when you think of the perfect name only to find out someone already claimed it. However, it wouldn't be fair for us to take that name away and give it to someone else regardless of how active that account may be.

so even tho its a level 1 and it hasn't been used for months on end there is absolutely nothing I can do about it DX? he has like no matches no history and its been like that forever

Yeeeaaaa unfortunately there's not anything we can do =(. I feel your pain though, My preferred name had already been taken as well DX. While they may not have any games played, they might have reserved the name to use in the future when they do start playing.
